name: tuneflow
description: High-fidelity YouTube to Spotify bridge with smart source switching

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:extension
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd tuneflow-backend && npm install && cd ../tuneflow-extension && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:extension
scripts.setup:backend: cd tuneflow-backend && cp .env.example .env && echo "Backend setup complete. Please edit .env with your Spotify credentials."
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:extension
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:extension
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:extension
scripts.clean:extension: cd tuneflow-extension && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json dist .plasmoid

author: TuneFlow Team
